definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)

sentences.english: These arenormally sedate affairs where empty chairs outnumber the audience.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，空椅子比聽衆多是讀書會上很平常的事。

sentences.english: Men, as a rule of thumb, should always keep their nails clipped.
sentences.chinese: 男人一般來說都應該保持指甲處於修剪過的狀態。

sentences.english: Eggs that are scrambled and eaten with toast are typically unfertilized.
sentences.chinese: 我們喫的炒雞蛋一般來說是未受精的雞蛋。

sentences.english: Baloney. He's usually in bed by now.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，到現在這個鐘點，他已經上牀睡覺了。

sentences.english: Generally speaking, ceramics product can is classified into two categories: practical and artistic.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，陶瓷產品可以分爲兩類，即。

sentences.english: In general , a clutch has a clutch has a clutch disc as its major part.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，離合器以離合器盤爲其主要部件。

sentences.english: Generally, it should not be modified by the author.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說作者不應該修改這些值。

sentences.english: I: Generally it is 6 months and during this period you are half-paid.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說是6個月，這段期間你只能拿到工資的一半。

sentences.english: Generally speaking , neither gold nor stone are soluble in water.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，金子和石頭都不能溶解於水。

sentences.english: Pennies in particular are rarely pure copper.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，硬幣很少使用純銅製造的。

sentences.english: Typically the marriages are arranged and women have two husbands.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，這裏沒有婚姻自由，一個女人有兩個老公。

sentences.english: As a rule competition reduces the difference in the prices on the same products to a minimum.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，同類產品的競爭可將價格差異降至最低。

sentences.english: In general, the information from the blog posts is informative.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，博客內的內容是具教育性的。

sentences.english: Generally speaking,the universe is hostile to man.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，宇宙對人是不友好的。

sentences.english: The dampened cloth makes a great dirt magnet.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，溼布是一塊絕妙的灰塵吸鐵石。

sentences.english: Generally, the sound of an announcer is euphonic.
sentences.chinese: 一般來說，播音員的聲音都很好聽。
